import React from 'react' import img1 from '../Images/1.png' import img2 from '../Images/2.png' import img3 from '../Images/3.png' import img4 from '../Images/4.png' import img5 from '../Images/5.png' import img6 from '../Images/6.png' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import '../Style/post.scss' const posts = [ { id:1, title:"A Researchrch On Producing Renewable On Producing Renewable Energy", disc:"hjioklpkjhutfrdtfhujiokpl;kjihufgtcdghjklkjhgfghjk", img:{img1}, }, { id:2, title:"Comparative Analysis Of Groundwater Quality Index For Bhavani River Basin Using Remote Sensing And Statistical Analysis", disc:"hjioklpkjhutfrdtfhujiokpl;ktgyhujiokjuhygtyjihufgtcdghjklkjhgfghjk", img:{img2}, }, { id:3, title:"A Research On Producing Gold ", disc:"hjrewrfjuhbygvtfbhunijkpl\n,ojiuygtfrghjklkjhgfghjk", img:{img3}, }, { id:4, title:"A Research On Producing Bombs ", disc:"hjioklpkjhutfrdtfhujiokpl\n;kjihufgtcdghjklkjhgfghjk", img:{img4}, }, { id:5, title:"A Research On Producing Cars ", disc:"hjioklpkjhutfrdtfhujiokpl;k\njihufgtcdghjklkjhgfghjk", img:{img5}, }, { id:6, title:"A Research On Producing DNA ", disc:"hjioklpkjhutfrdtfhujiokpl;kji\nhufgtcdghjklkjhgfghjk", img:{img6}, }, ] const Home = () => { return (
{posts.map(post =>(

{post.title}

{post.disc}

))}
) } export default Home // Styling
